  • CAD switch: File attachments
  • View page source

CAD switch: File attachmentsÂ¶

Disable Attach Document

You can disable the “Attach document” explicitly by using this switch. This function is available by default.

Disallow Delete Attachment

This switch allows you to prevent the removal of attachments from e-mails before archiving. This function is disabled by default.
